Name: My Burning Heart
About the game: My Burning Heart is an erotic Visual Novel, for 18+ only, with homosexual explicit content, set in an Arabian Nights world. Our protagonist, Adnan, gets sold as a slave and, instead of being sent to work in the fields, as he expected, he ends up in a Sultan’s harem… Although they try to trick him with good words and promises of being well-fed and no physical punishments, he decides to comply with the Sultan’s orders… but only while he plans his escape from the palace. Features: - 65k words (around 5 hours of gameplay). - Two routes, each one with a good and a bad ending, plus an additional good end with the villain (100% consensual!) - 13 stunning CGs with variations (most of them +18 rated). - Detailed adult scenes. - Telltales on each choice to help you get your chosen route. - Free demo released for Yaoi Jam 2018. - Full English voice acting. - Steam Achievements. - Text available in English, Spanish and German. COMING SOON: - French translation. - Steam Trading Cards. - After stories. Team: -Ertal, developer, writer and PR. -6nii9, main artist. Disclaimer: Despite what the early characters' descriptions might say, ALL THE CHARACTERS ARE ABOVE 18 YEARS OLD
